titles.title: Post Office Modernization Act of 2009
To amend title 39, United States Code, to require post offices to have running water and sanitation facilities, and for other purposes.
Post Office Modernization Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

bill.summary:
Post Office Modernization Act of 2009 - Requires the Postal Service to ensure that every post office has access to running water and bathroom facilities.
Prohibits the Post Office, in making a determination whether or not to close or consolidate a post office, from considering whether the post office meets the requirements of this Act.
